00048 //
00049 // Vec3 Description
00050 //
00051 //
00053 
00054 class Vec3 : public D3DXVECTOR3 
00055 {
00056 public:
00057         inline float Length() { return D3DXVec3Length(this); }
00058         inline Vec3 *Normalize() { return static_cast<Vec3 *>(D3DXVec3Normalize(this, this)); }
00059         inline float Dot(const Vec3 &b) { return D3DXVec3Dot(this, &b); }
00060         inline Vec3 Cross(const Vec3 &b) const;
00061 
00062         Vec3(D3DXVECTOR3 &v3) { x = v3.x; y = v3.y; z = v3.z; }
00063         Vec3() : D3DXVECTOR3() { }
00064         Vec3(const float _x, const float _y, const float _z) { x=_x; y=_y; z=_z; }
00065         inline Vec3(const class Vec4 &v4);
00066 };
00067 
00068 inline Vec3 Vec3::Cross(const Vec3 &b) const
00069 {
00070         Vec3 out;
00071         D3DXVec3Cross(&out, this, &b);
00072         return out;
00073 }
00074

00077 //
00078 // Vec4 Description
00079 //
00080 //
00082 
00083 class Vec4 : public D3DXVECTOR4
00084 {
00085 public:
00086         inline float Length() { return D3DXVec4Length(this); }
00087         inline Vec4 *Normalize() { return static_cast<Vec4 *>(D3DXVec4Normalize(this, this)); }
00088         // If you want the cross product, use Vec3::Cross
00089         inline float Dot(const Vec4 &b) { return D3DXVec4Dot(this, &b); }
00090 
00091         Vec4(D3DXVECTOR4 &v4)  { x = v4.x; y = v4.y; z = v4.z; w = v4.w; }
00092         Vec4() : D3DXVECTOR4() { }
00093         Vec4(const float _x, const float _y, const float _z, const float _w) { x=_x; y=_y; z=_z; w=_w; }
00094         Vec4(const Vec3 &v3) { x = v3.x; y = v3.y; z = v3.z; w = 1.0f; }
00095 
00096 };
00097 
00098 inline Vec3::Vec3(const Vec4 &v4) { x = v4.x; y = v4.y; z = v4.z; }

00121 class Quaternion : public D3DXQUATERNION
00122 {
00123 public:
00124 
00125         // Modifiers
00126         void Normalize() { D3DXQuaternionNormalize(this, this); };
00127         void Slerp(const Quaternion &begin, const Quaternion &end, float cooef)
00128         {
00129                 // performs spherical linear interpolation between begin & end 
00130                 // NOTE: set cooef between 0.0f-1.0f
00131                 D3DXQuaternionSlerp(this, &begin, &end, cooef);
00132         }
00133 
00134         // Accessors
00135         void GetAxisAngle(Vec3 &axis, float &angle) const
00136         {
00137                 D3DXQuaternionToAxisAngle(this, &axis, &angle); 
00138         }
00139 
00140         // Initializers
00141         void Build(const class Mat4x4 &mat); 
00142 
00143         void BuildRotYawPitchRoll(
00144                         const float yawRadians, 
00145                         const float pitchRadians, 
00146                         const float rollRadians)
00147         {
00148                 D3DXQuaternionRotationYawPitchRoll(this, yawRadians, pitchRadians, rollRadians);
00149         }
00150 
00151         void BuildAxisAngle(const Vec3 &axis, const float radians)
00152         {
00153                 D3DXQuaternionRotationAxis(this, &axis, radians);
00154         }
00155         
00156         Quaternion(D3DXQUATERNION &m);
00157         Quaternion() : D3DXQUATERNION() { }
00158 
00159         static Quaternion g_Identity;
00160 };
00161 
00162 inline Quaternion operator * (const Quaternion &a, const Quaternion &b) 
00163 {
00164         // for rotations, this is exactly like concatenating
00165         // matrices - the new quat represents rot A followed by rot B.
00166         Quaternion out;
00167         D3DXQuaternionMultiply(&out, &a, &b);
00168         return out;
00169 }

00181 class Mat4x4 : public D3DXMATRIX
00182 {
00183 public:
00184         // Modifiers
00185         inline void SetPosition(Vec3 const &pos);
00186         inline void SetPosition(Vec4 const &pos);
00187 
00188         // Accessors and Calculation Methods
00189         inline Vec3 GetPosition() const;
00190         inline Vec4 Xform(Vec4 &v) const;
00191         inline Vec3 Xform(Vec3 &v) const;
00192         inline Mat4x4 Inverse() const;
00193 
00194         Mat4x4(D3DXMATRIX &m);
00195         Mat4x4() : D3DXMATRIX() { }
00196 
00197         static Mat4x4 g_Identity;
00198 
00199         // Initialization methods
00200         inline void BuildTranslation(const Vec3 &pos);
00201         inline void BuildTranslation(const float x, const float y, const float z );
00202         inline void BuildRotationX(const float radians) { D3DXMatrixRotationX(this, radians); }
00203         inline void BuildRotationY(const float radians) { D3DXMatrixRotationY(this, radians); }
00204         inline void BuildRotationZ(const float radians) { D3DXMatrixRotationZ(this, radians); }
00205         inline void BuildYawPitchRoll(const float yawRadians, const float pitchRadians, const float rollRadians)
00206                 { D3DXMatrixRotationYawPitchRoll(this, yawRadians, pitchRadians, rollRadians); }
00207         inline void BuildRotationQuat(const Quaternion &q) { D3DXMatrixRotationQuaternion(this, &q); }
00208 };

00210 
00211 inline void Mat4x4::SetPosition(Vec3 const &pos)
00212 {
00213         m[3][0] = pos.x;
00214         m[3][1] = pos.y;
00215         m[3][2] = pos.z;
00216         m[3][3] = 1.0f;
00217 }
00218 
00219 inline void Mat4x4::SetPosition(Vec4 const &pos)
00220 {
00221         m[3][0] = pos.x;
00222         m[3][1] = pos.y;
00223         m[3][2] = pos.z;
00224         m[3][3] = pos.w;
00225 }
00226 
00227 inline Vec3 Mat4x4::GetPosition() const
00228 {
00229         Vec3 pos;
00230         pos.x = m[3][0];
00231         pos.y = m[3][1];
00232         pos.z = m[3][2];
00233         return pos;
00234 }
00235 
00236 inline Vec4 Mat4x4::Xform(Vec4 &v) const
00237 {
00238         Vec4 temp;
00239         D3DXVec4Transform(&temp, &v, this);
00240         return temp;
00241 }
00242 
00243 inline Vec3 Mat4x4::Xform(Vec3 &v) const
00244 {
00245         Vec4 temp(v);
00246         Vec4 out;
00247         D3DXVec4Transform(&out, &temp, this);
00248         return Vec3(out.x, out.y, out.z);
00249 }
00250 
00251 inline Mat4x4 Mat4x4::Inverse() const
00252 {
00253         Mat4x4 out;
00254         D3DXMatrixInverse(&out, NULL, this);
00255         return out;
00256 }
00257 
00258 inline void Mat4x4::BuildTranslation(const Vec3 &pos)
00259 {
00260         *this = Mat4x4::g_Identity;
00261         m[3][0] = pos.x;
00262         m[3][1] = pos.y;
00263         m[3][2] = pos.z;
00264 }
00265 
00266 inline void Mat4x4::BuildTranslation(const float x, const float y, const float z )
00267 {
00268         *this = Mat4x4::g_Identity;
00269         m[3][0] = x;
00270         m[3][1] = y;
00271         m[3][2] = z;
00272 }
00273 
00274 
00275 inline Mat4x4 operator * (const Mat4x4 &a, const Mat4x4 &b) 
00276 {
00277         Mat4x4 out;
00278         D3DXMatrixMultiply(&out, &a, &b);
00279         return out;
00280 }
00281 
00282 inline void Quaternion::Build(const Mat4x4 &mat) 
00283 { 
00284         D3DXQuaternionRotationMatrix(this, &mat); 
00285 }

00289 //
00290 // Vertex Type Definitions
00291 //
00292 //  TRANSFORMED_VERTEX Description
00293 //  UNTRANSFORMED_VERTEX Description
00294 //  UNTRANSFORMED_LIT_VERTEX Description
00295 //  UNTRANSFORMED_UNLIT_VERTEX Description
00296 //  COLORED_TEXTURED_VERTEX Description
00297 //  COLORED_VERTEX Description
00298 //
00299 //  Note: There's been a slight change from the book in this code.
00300 //        Instead of #define D3DFVF_BlahBlah they are static constants;
00301 //        find them at the top of Geometry.cpp
00302 //
00303 // See Chapter 13, page 459, 463, 464
00305 
00306 struct TRANSFORMED_VERTEX
00307 {
00308     D3DXVECTOR3 position;       // The screen x, y, z
00309         float rhw;                              // always 1.0, the reciprocal of homogeneous w)
00310 
00311         static DWORD FVF;
00312 };
00313 
00314 
00315 struct UNTRANSFORMED_VERTEX
00316 {
00317     D3DXVECTOR3 position; // The position in 3D space
00318 
00319         static DWORD FVF;
00320 };
00321 
00322 
00323 struct UNTRANSFORMED_LIT_VERTEX
00324 {
00325     D3DXVECTOR3 position;       // The position in 3D space
00326     D3DCOLOR    diffuse;    // The diffuse color
00327     D3DCOLOR    specular;   // The specular color
00328 
00329         static DWORD FVF;
00330 };
00331 
00332 struct UNTRANSFORMED_UNLIT_VERTEX
00333 {
00334     D3DXVECTOR3 position;       // The position in 3D space
00335     D3DXVECTOR3 normal;         // The normal vector (must be 1.0 units in length)
00336     D3DCOLOR    diffuse;    // The diffuse color
00337     D3DCOLOR    specular;   // The specular color
00338 
00339         static DWORD FVF;
00340 };

00344 // A structure for our custom vertex type. We added texture coordinates
00345 struct COLORED_TEXTURED_VERTEX
00346 {
00347     D3DXVECTOR3 position; // The position
00348     D3DCOLOR    color;    // The color
00349     FLOAT       tu, tv;   // The texture coordinates
00350 
00351         static DWORD FVF;
00352 };
00353 
00354 
00355 // A structure for our custom vertex type. We added texture coordinates
00356 struct COLORED_VERTEX
00357 {
00358     D3DXVECTOR3 position; // The position
00359     D3DCOLOR    color;    // The color
00360 
00361         static DWORD FVF;
00362 };

00368 //
00369 // TriangleIterator Definition - added post press
00370 //
00371 //    Allows a variety of different vertex buffers to be iterated as
00372 //    a series of triangles.
00373 //
00375 
00376 class TriangleIterator
00377 {
00378 protected:
00379         Vec3 *m_Triangles;
00380         unsigned int m_Size;
00381 
00382 public:
00383         TriangleIterator() { m_Triangles=0; m_Size=0; }
00384         virtual ~TriangleIterator() { SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(m_Triangles); }
00385 
00386         bool InitializeStrippedMesh(LPDIRECT3DVERTEXBUFFER9 pVerts, int stride, int strips, int *triCountList );
00387 
00388         virtual unsigned int VGetSize() { return m_Size; }
00389         virtual void *VGet(unsigned int i);
00390 };

00394 //
00395 // Plane Definition
00396 //
00398 
00399 class Plane : public D3DXPLANE
00400 {
00401 public:
00402         inline void Normalize();
00403 
00404         // normal faces away from you if you send in verts in counter clockwise order....
00405         inline void Init(const Vec3 &p0, const Vec3 &p1, const Vec3 &p2);
00406         bool Inside(const Vec3 &point, const float radius) const;
00407         bool Inside(const Vec3 &point) const;
00408 };
00409 
00410 inline void Plane::Normalize()
00411 {
00412         float mag;
00413         mag = sqrt(a * a + b * b + c * c);
00414         a = a / mag;
00415         b = b / mag;
00416         c = c / mag;
00417         d = d / mag;
00418 }
00419 
00420 inline void Plane::Init(const Vec3 &p0, const Vec3 &p1, const Vec3 &p2)
00421 {
00422         D3DXPlaneFromPoints(this, &p0, &p1, &p2);
00423         Normalize();
00424 }
00425 
00427 //
00428 // Frustum Definition
00429 //
00431 
00432 class Frustum
00433 {
00434 public:
00435         enum Side { Near, Far, Top, Right, Bottom, Left, NumPlanes };
00436 
00437         Plane m_Planes[NumPlanes];      // planes of the frusum in camera space
00438         Vec3 m_NearClip[4];                     // verts of the near clip plane in camera space
00439         Vec3 m_FarClip[4];                      // verts of the far clip plane in camera space
00440 
00441         float m_Fov;                            // field of view in radians
00442         float m_Aspect;                         // aspect ratio - width divided by height
00443         float m_Near;                           // near clipping distance
00444         float m_Far;                            // far clipping distance
00445 
00446 public:
00447         Frustum();
00448 
00449         bool Inside(const Vec3 &point) const;
00450         bool Inside(const Vec3 &point, const float radius) const;
00451         const Plane &Get(Side side) { return m_Planes[side]; }
00452         void SetFOV(float fov) { m_Fov=fov; Init(m_Fov, m_Aspect, m_Near, m_Far); }
00453         void SetAspect(float aspect) { m_Aspect=aspect; Init(m_Fov, m_Aspect, m_Near, m_Far); }
00454         void SetNear(float nearClip) { m_Near=nearClip; Init(m_Fov, m_Aspect, m_Near, m_Far); }
00455         void SetFar(float farClip) { m_Far=farClip; Init(m_Fov, m_Aspect, m_Near, m_Far); }
00456         void Init(const float fov, const float aspect, const float near, const float far);
00457 
00458         void Render();
00459 };
00460 
00461 
00462 inline Vec3 CalcVelocity(Vec3 const &pos0, Vec3 const &pos1, float time)
00463 {
00464         // CalcVelocity - Chapter 15, page TODO
00465         return (pos1 - pos0) / time;
00466 }
00467 
00468 inline Vec3 CalcAcceleration(Vec3 const &vel0, Vec3 const &vel1, float time)
00469 {
00470         // CalcVelocity - Chapter 15, page TODO
00471         return (vel1 - vel0) / time;
00472 }
00473 
00474 inline Vec3 HandleAccel(Vec3 &pos, Vec3 &vel, Vec3 &accel, float time)
00475 {
00476         // CalcVelocity - Chapter 15, page TODO
00477         vel += accel * time;
00478         pos += vel * time;
00479 }
